sections.heading: Recompiled.Section 24-17B-2 - Recompiled.Section 24-17B-3 - Recompiled.Section 24-17B-4 - Recompiled.Section 24-17B-5 - Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2021, ch. 111, § 1; § 24-17B-1, recompiled and amended as § 24A-6-1 by Laws 2024, ch. 39, § 48.

Recompilations.— Laws 2024, ch. 39, § 48 recompiled and amended former 24-17B-1 NMSA 1978 as 24A-6-1 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 2024.
